Fragment Of Tunic, 6th–8th century.
6th–8th century. Medium: Warp; S-spun linen. Wefts; Z-spun linen, Z-spun wools
technique; plain weave and slit tapestry weave. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-170.
